pages.text: Throughout the simulation there will be tooltips attached to items to further guide you.$(br2)After all I don't expect you to have the manual open all the time.$(br2)$(o)Only half of the time$()

pages.title: Example Tooltip
pages.text: Hover over the item!$(br2)$(primary)To find all of the items with$(br)a hint/tip just search JEI for "Atlas Tip"
